definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Creative sketchbook allows you to draw websites and web apps.
sentences.chinese: 很有创意的速写册，可供你画出网址和网页应用软件。

sentences.english: Suppose that the application authenticates a user given a user name and password.
sentences.chinese: 假设这个应用软件鉴定了一个特定的用户名和密码。

sentences.english: The instructions here do not cover how to create users in either application.
sentences.chinese: 这里的指令并不包括如何在任何应用软件中创建用户。

sentences.english: Working at Dampier Co. , which develops applied software.
sentences.chinese: 我在丹皮尔公司，它主要是开发应用软件。

sentences.english: The multi-language software system can be used widely in jointed ventures in China.
sentences.chinese: 多语种的应用软件在中外合资企业应用前景光明。

sentences.english: These apps will also be able to auto-update.
sentences.chinese: 这些应用软件将也可以自动升级。

sentences.english: ABSTACT:MATLAB language is the internationally recognized one of the outstanding mathematical application software.
sentences.chinese: 是国际公认的优秀数学应用软件之一。

sentences.english: All of your work will be saved, even if you leave the application.
sentences.chinese: 您的所有工作都要保存，即使您停止了这个应用软件。

sentences.english: Does anyone know how it compares to Googles office apps?
sentences.chinese: 有谁知道如何比较谷歌办公应用软件？

sentences.english: Apps for Climate competition hopes to jumpstart ideas for assessing and dealing with risk.
sentences.chinese: 气候应用软件竞赛希望开启评估和应对风险的思路。

sentences.english: Application software and File System are upgradable over the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 应用软件和文件系统可以通过网络升级。

sentences.english: Why is the impact of application software quality growing?
sentences.chinese: 为什么应用软件质量的影响与日俱增？

sentences.english: The application software package of Ocean Data View (ODV) is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 对ODV这一海洋数据视图应用软件包作了介绍。

sentences.english: Your memory is too small to run this application software.
sentences.chinese: 你的内存太小，无法运行这个应用软件。

sentences.english: Its software design in practical application is descibed.
sentences.chinese: 对此主要从应用软件的设计方法上进行了讨论。

sentences.english: You can add new methods to fit the use cases of your application.
sentences.chinese: 您可以添加新方法，以符合您的应用软件的用例。

definition: see 開放源碼|开放源码[kai1 fang4 yuan2 ma3]
